articles.title: SBS bus slams into Punggol bus stop panel shattering glass on upper deck
articles.content: A video posted on Instagram shows the bus with visible damage to its upper deck. According to the video caption, the incident occurred at Punggol Oasis bus stop. Responding to queries from AsiaOne, SBS Transit spokesperson Grace Wu said the incident occurred on Saturday afternoon, with no injuries reported. Wu added that SBS is currently investigating the cause of the incident.
